titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: Ella went on to London. I returned to Auckland. After dealing with the correspondence, Clayton and I motored to Durham, & lunched with the High Sheriff. I proposed his health. We then returned to Auckland, where I completed my preparations for the National Assembly. We motored into Durham again in order to dine with the High Sheriff in the County Club: and returned to Auckland after dinner.
